W) Divisions are based on time periods of equal length X) Divisions are based on evidence of paleoclimates Y) Divisions are based on domination by groups of major fauna Z) Divisions are based on domination by major rock types
answer: Y) DIVISIONS ARE BASED ON DOMINATION BY GROUPS OF MAJOR FAUNA
